text: The Dodge Durango is a full-sized SUV that was built by Chrysler's Dodge brand from 1998 to 2008. The Durango was discontinued in 2009 but returned in 2010 to share a platform with the Jeep Grand Cherokee. The Durango had two generations, the first generation was a mid-sized SUV and was produced from 1998 to 2003 and the second generation which is a full-sized SUV and was produced from 2003-2008. Category:Dodge automobiles Category:Green vehicles Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles
title: Dodge Durango
